properties.name: telegrambot.exception.default-handler.message
properties.description: Default message that bot will send if unhandled exception caught.

properties.name: telegrambot.exception.default-handler.enable-stacktrace
properties.description: Is print stack trace required in default exception handler.

properties.name: telegrambot.statesource.initial-state
properties.description: Initial state when user text bot for the first time.
